movies.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
movies.plot: John Wick is on the run after killing a member of the international assassins' guild, and with a $14 million price tag on his head, he is the target of hit men and women everywhere.

movies.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
movies.plot: After returning to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, John Wick discovers that a large bounty has been put on his life.

movies.title: John Wick
movies.plot: An ex-hit-man comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that killed his dog and took everything from him.
